name: Goose
text:
1 "Duck" Tuner monster + 1+ "Duck" monster(s)
If this card is Special Summoned, you can target 1 "Duck" monster in your GY; equip it to this card. If a Spell/Trap card is activated: You can send 1 card that is equipped to this card to the GY; negate the activation and if you do, destroy it. You can use this effect of "Goose" once per turn. Once per turn, if all monsters you control are "Duck" monsters: You can draw 2 cards.
